entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:05 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 0.0°C

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
